workshoptitle: Deploy Java applications on Ampere A1 with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Create an OCI Arm A1 instance
Running Java web applications on Ampere A1 Compute
tutorials.description: This workshop guides the user through building and deploying a Java web application running on OCI Arm A1 Compute platform. The sample application is deployed on Apache Tomcat 9.0 and uses MySQL as a database.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
